title: Secret Celebrity Renovation
overview: Secret Celebrity Renovation, a new one-hour reality series that gives celebrities in sports, music and entertainment the chance to gift a surprise home renovation to a meaningful person who helped guide them to success. Celebrities participating in making these heartfelt gifts include GRAMMY(R)-winning artist and host Eve; actor and comedian Wayne Brady; NBA All-Star Chris Paul; Pro Football Hall of Fame running back Emmitt Smith and more.
